name: Lost and Found Co.: Night at Hollowville
name_original: Lost and Found Co.: Night at Hollowville
description:
🎃🎃 A Halloween demo for Lost and Found Co! 🎃🎃
---

Lost and Found Co. is a cute and charming 2D hidden object game full of richly animated scenes and a colorful cast of quirky characters. 

Start your adventure as Ducky, a former duck transformed into a human, and the once renowned goddess of war, Mei. Help Mei regain her fame by traveling the world on a dramatic journey, following clues, and solving puzzles to locate lost items.
